doc:
Emile de Antonio https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emile_de_Antonio 0 Emile Francisco de Antonio (May 14, 1919 – December 15, 1989) was an American director and producer of documentary films, usually detailing political, social, and counterculture events circa 1960s–1980s. He has been referred to by scholars and critics alike, and arguably remains, "…the most important political filmmaker in the United States during the Cold War." Emile_Francisco de Antonio ( May_14_,_1919 – December_15_,_1989 ) was an_American_director_and_producer of documentary_films , usually detailing political_,_social_,_and_counterculture_events circa 1960s – 1980s . He has_been_referred to by_scholars_and_critics alike , and arguably_remains , " … the_most_important_political_filmmaker in the_United_States during the_Cold_War .
